description: This dashboard works with opengauss_exporter for prometheus

panels.description: 当前事务数,统计提交和回滚xact_commit+xact_rollback
panels.title: TPS

targets.expr: pg_stat_activity_count{datname=~"$datname", pod=~"$podname", state=~"idle in transaction|idle in transaction (aborted)"}

targets.legendFormat: write_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk.
sync_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk.

title: MogDB
